Custom Industrial
Refrigeration Sytems

Straightline Refrigeration offers expert custom design, building, and installation of industrial refrigeration systems.

Innovation + Refrigeration

With years of ammonia experience, Straightline Refrigeration provides exceptional design, building and installation of fully custom industrial refrigeration systems. As a local contractor, our small team of carefully assembled experts manages each job with the highest standards for customer service, product development, performance and safety.
